modName: Seith Nikos - Dark Elf Male Follower
summary: Just a simple companion mod which adds a male dark elf follower to the game.
descriptionHtml:
(PLEASE READ: Ok so this is like my first mod and I'm still new to this. People have been having problems and I know what the reason for these problems is but I don't know how to fix it nor can I be bothered to do anything about it. Manually installing the mod should get it to work.)

My first ever mod, couldn't find an attractive male dark elf for my character to marry so I made my own.

You can find him at the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun walking around in his underpants after indulging a bit too much mead.

I recommend you use:
Javett's Less Harsh Elves and mrLenski's Cover Eyes:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/369//?
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869/?
author: yoshilin
